ai.summary: A short, easy 1.6 km hike in the UK featuring gentle terrain and minimal elevation gain. Ideal for beginners, families, or a quick outdoor refresh, with straightforward navigation and pleasant views.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly flat, well-defined paths with grassy and gravel surfaces. Expect occasional uneven patches and damp ground. Coastal or open-country exposure may bring wind and variable weather; check conditions before you go.
ai.safety_notes: Check weather conditions and, if near water, tide times. Wear sturdy shoes and bring water. Stay on marked trails, tell someone your plans, and carry a charged phone. Be prepared for slippery surfaces when wet and reduced visibility in poor weather.
recommended_gear: Map, guidebook, or offline map on phone
Light gloves or fleece if chilly
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn (roughly March–October) generally offers milder weather and longer daylight in the UK. The hike is also doable year-round with appropriate clothing.

seo.title: Neapaback Burravoe – Easy 1.6 km Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Neapaback Burravoe, a short 1.6 km easy hike in the UK. Gentle terrain, minimal elevation, and scenic views—perfect for beginners. Includes safety tips and gear suggestions.
